channel.title: How to run Sarantium Client
channel.description: Hi. I don't know how to run Saranthium server. when it loads i put my user name and password, but there are some word with color blue saying: <Error connecting to server> plzz help.

item.title: How to run Sarantium Client
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

In the server folder find a batch file called run and double click on it. Then on your client make your ip 127.0.0.1 and normally the port will be 43594 however there are some variations.

Read full topic
